main.name: Caroline Danson
main.description: After quite a few years in social work I changed my carrier path to work with my passion - IT. I have mainly worked with Java, ReactJs, Javascript and Flutter
main.bio: So who am I? I’m a calm, positive and curious person originating from the north of Sweden. I love to take on new challenges and learn new things! I have for several years worked as a social worker but have now re-educated myself to be able to work within the IT-industry. I have experience both with backend development in Java and frontend development in Javascript, ReactJs, CSS, HTML and Flutter. I’m a certified Scrum Master(PSM I). I enjoy solving complex problems and working in teams, whilst having fun along the way.
main.contactmessage: I would love to hear from you! If you wish to get in touch please fill in your details below and I'll get back in touch as soon as possible.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
